basic.description:
This course provides an introduction to a wide variety of factors which could affect a person's physical health.
NOTE    Not available to students in a PHED or KINE Plan.
LEARNING HOURS    108 (36L;72P)
basic.subject: HLTH
basic.title: Physical Determinants of Health

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Not open to students in a PHED or KINE plan
ONE WAY EXCLUSION  May not be taken with or after 12.0 units in KNPE
